com.saptarshidebnath.lib.processrunner.output

Class LogHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.saptarshidebnath.lib.processrunner.output.LogHandler

  • public class LogHandler
extends Object
    Writes the process logs as single line json of format OutputRecord to the file as configured in Configuration.getMasterLogFile(). If Configuration.getMasterLogFile() returns null, the logs will not be written.

    • Constructor Detail

      • LogHandler

        public LogHandler(Process process,
                  Configuration configuration)
        The construcor of the class LogHandler.

        The class receives a reference of the Process and Configuration. The class then internally takes care of creating all the process output reading threads i.e. both OutputSourceType.SYSERR and OutputSourceType.SYSOUT and writing the same to the disk in separate thread. The class also provides a blocking method waitForShutdown() so that you can wait for all logs to be streamed, written to disk or both.

        The class internally uses an executor service from Threadify.getProcessRunnerExecutorService()

        Parameters:
        process - a object of type Process
        configuration - a reference of type Configuration

    • Method Detail

      • start

        public LogHandler start()
                 throws FileNotFoundException
        Throws:
        FileNotFoundException

      • saveInpuStreamToDisk

        private void saveInpuStreamToDisk(InputStream inputStream,
                                  OutputSourceType outputSourceType)
        Threadify the writing of the inputStream to disk.

        Internal method and shouldn't be used externally.

        Parameters:
        inputStream - InputStream from Process.getInputStream() and Process.getErrorStream().
        outputSourceType - Type of Output as per OutputSourceType

      • waitForShutdown

        public void waitForShutdown()
                     throws InterruptedException,
                            ExecutionException
        Blocking method to wait for all all 3 threads to be finished. 2 threads are to read OutputSourceType.SYSOUT and OutputSourceType.SYSERR. The last thread is to write the read InputStream to disk.

        Call this method to wait for the log handler threads to be finished execution.

        Throws:
        InterruptedException - when the ExecutorService.awaitTermination(long, TimeUnit) is interrupted by some other Thread.
        ExecutionException - when waiting for the disk writer to finish.

      • writeToDisk

        private int writeToDisk()
                 throws InterruptedException
        Write the content of queue to the file as recived from Configuration object.

        Internal method, shouldn't be used externallyy. Automatically called when a object of LogHandler is created.

        Returns:
        int depciting the number of lines written.
        Throws:
        InterruptedException - if the disk writing thread is interrupted.

      • readInputStream

        private void readInputStream(InputStream inputStream,
                             OutputSourceType outputSourceType)
        Reads the InputStream and write them to a queue as OutputRecord.

        This is a internal method and shouldn't be used by any body in the library.

        Parameters:
        inputStream - the InputStream to be read. The inputStream is received from Process.getErrorStream() and Process.getInputStream().
        outputSourceType - either as input OutputSourceType.SYSOUT or OutputSourceType.SYSERR.
